response.overview: A choreographer, a director of photography, a music composer and five dancers meet up on infinite ground, a space filled with interlinked relationships. A moment of gaze upon each other tampers in a stream of emotions that flows out with different dynamics. Five strangers are gathered in the same unwelcoming space, fighting together for a way out, tired by their confused thoughts, trying to regain strength over their altered bodies. The story unfolds itself from within. The camera bursts into the heart of the dance whilst the music copes with the cruelty and the fever of every day's warfare.
response.title: Silent Places
